amendment.description: To modify a provision relating to child sexual abuse and prevention treatment programs.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 4026 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 4026 proposed by Senator Coburn to Amendment SA 3899. (consideration: CR S996-1004,S1040) To modify a provision relating to child sexual abuse and prevention treatment programs.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4026 proposed by Senator Coburn to Amendment SA 3899.
